author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Anatomy of a Killer
The behavior of a 19-year-old accused of killing 17 people at a Florida high school repeatedly raised red flags before this weekâ€™s massacre. Nikolas Cruz admitted to being the gunman who entered the campus armed with an AR-15-style rifle and shot students whom he saw in the hallways and elsewhere on the school grounds, according to a complaint affidavit. Authorities, neighbors and former schoolmates painted a picture of a troubled young man who struggled to control his behavior. Mr. Cruz, who... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
